reviewText:
Great documentary. Love my boy Dirk.
Definitely a great watch if you are a fan
mighty fine flick. not too intrusive and gave us alot of information on the big German. Go Mavs!!!

The movie was great. The only difficulty was trying to read the subtitles at the same time the names of the people being interviewed were shown.  If you're a Dirk and/or Mavericks fan, you must see this.

Most Humble Super Star in Sports, Loved every minute of it

Great role model for young kids to look up to these days!
Perfect Documentary, Dirk u deserve all of these!
Great movie. Especially for a MFFL!!!!
Really enjoyed it. Dirk seems like a great guy. Nice to see some of his history.
Enjoyed the movie. Very educational concerning Dirk. A lot of sub titles, which could be a negative to some...
Very entertaining and fun to watch. Really had to focus due to subtitles
Awesome!
Dirk is the man. This was awesome.
Have watched Dirk's play since he joined the Mav's, and enjoyed the video. One of the NBA greats.
It's was great seeing another side of Dirk.
The greatest basketball player to have ever lived.
I bought this as a gift, so I'm not sure if the actually quality is good. But the shipment was fast & efficient :) So thats where it gets the stars :)
This was an outstanding an entertaining documentary on Dirk and his coach/mentor.

Dirk is the GOAT in my heart. He brings a revolution of the game. Personally he is funny, humorous, extremely humble, and he is my role model since I were 8. This DVD is in great condition, and it allows you to know Dirk better. Love it! Buy it!!!!
Go Mavs!
Great quality. Be prepared to read subtitles. We're huge Mavs fans. Learned some new facts about Dirk. His parents are very interesting.

This is really a great DVD, I purchased this with money left over from a gift card I had. I always have been a fan of Dirk because of his unique skill set that he brings to the game. He is really one of those quiet superstars that we don't know about because he is foreign born. It's extremely interesting on his workout routines, his personal coach and a look into his personal life. Dirk will go down as one of the greatest players of all time but he seems to be even a better person. Throughly enjoyed this DVD and a must have for any basketball fan...
I'm a big fan of basketball in general, so I really enjoyed this closer look at one of the best players to ever grace the court.  An inspiring and interesting story, and a must see for any hoops fan.
DIRK ROCKS
